String.string: [Dragonfall] Ask Yedwin, Explorer Guild Master of Dragonfall, about the kidnapping incident.
Wipe out the mekonari hunters and ebonweavers that are kidnapping people in the Nightwood.
[Camp Umbra] Enlist Arshak's help stopping the ritual.
We'll add your bones to the pile!
Volunteering for the ritual? How marvelous!
[Raven Altar] Search mekonari templars and dedicants for a key to the altar.
[Raven Altar] Keep searching for the way to the altar.
[Raven Altar] Talk to the ghostly figure.
[Raven Altar] Follow the spirit to the altar entrance.
Enter the teleportal to the Raven Altar Stop the ritual: timed, 16 minutes Destroy the pillar of blood on the Raven Altar and stop the ritual to awaken Sikander.
